#include "spark.h"

Include dependency graph for capratel.cc:

Detailed Description

Capacitance rate for water.

Calculates capacitance rate for water side of heat exchanger. Product of mass flow rate and heat capacity of water.

Note:
Used in wet coil objects.
Acceptable input set: mWater = 1
